title: KIM SWITCH / FIGHT FAILURE
description: Kim's reaction to You trying to punch Measurehead and failing at it.

dialogueTree.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm not even sure the *one bullet*..."
dialogueTree.text: "I'm not even sure the *one bullet* my chamber holds would even prick that hulk."

links.title: You: ""But *he's* the one trying to provo..."
Kim Kitsuragi: ""And you're just going to *let* him..."
links.text: "And you're just going to *let* him manipulate you like that?" He raises an eyebrow.

links.title: You: ""Okay, I was trying to assert my do..."
links.text: "Okay, I was trying to assert my dominance over him."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We're not here on some political q..."
links.text: "We're not here on some political quest, we're here to solve a crime. Don't make this situation any more volatile than it already is."

links.title: You: ""But... I was fighting *bad*, unsav..."
links.text: "But... I was fighting *bad*, unsavoury ideologies. I'm a hero."

links.title: You: ""How else are we gonna get through..."
links.text: "How else are we gonna get through the gates?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There must be some other way. Let'..."
links.text: "There must be some other way. Let's go see the yard again -- it faces the other end of the harbour. We're done with Measurehead here."

links.title: You: ""Can't promise that. I might attack..."
links.text: "Can't promise that. I might attack him again." [Leave.]

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant groans, but doesn't..."
links.text: The lieutenant groans, but doesn't say anything.

links.title: Volition: "That's right, you *should* do it ag..."
links.text: That's right, you *should* do it again! It's the *last* thing he'll be expecting.

links.title: You: ""Alright, fine. I won't do it again..."
links.text: "Alright, fine. I won't do it again." [Leave.]

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He nods. "Let's think of something..."
links.text: He nods. "Let's think of something else."

links.title: Volition: "No, no. You *should* do it again. I..."
links.text: No, no. You *should* do it again. It's the *last* thing he'll be expecting.
